page.title: 08``````` A SUPERMARKET ``````
page.content: Kwik Save is a major{employer }in Prestatyn.They employ 222 people in their head office,25 people in the garage,140 people in the warehouse and 28 people in the store.It is also such a large land owner that they contribute substantial rates to the council.{ Kwik Save}was founded in 1966 by a man called{Mr.Albert Gubay. Kwik Save buy goods in bulk and make a small profit on every item that they sell, relying on a huge turnover to make profits of over Â£30m. Kwik Save employ their own joiners,mechanics,plumbers and lorry drivers.They also have their own fleet of lorries and fork lift trucks so that the whole operation is under their control.
